1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Generic content class.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Content
6  ( -- * Generic content
7    CContent (..),
8    typeOrder,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Singleton     as D
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Simple        as D
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Complex       as D
15
16-- | Generic content class.
17class (Ord c, Show c, B.MixShortEncode c, D.CTypeOf c,
18       D.CEmpty c, D.CEnd c,
19       D.CBool c, D.CCode c, D.CText c, D.CClock c, D.CTime c,
20       D.CTerm c, D.CDec c, D.CType c, D.CInterp c,
21       D.CList c, D.CSet c, D.CTie c, D.CRel c) =>
22    CContent c where
23
24    appendContent :: c -> c -> B.Ab c
25
26    joinContent :: [c] -> B.Ab c
27    joinContent = B.foldM appendContent D.empty
28
29-- | Order of type.
30typeOrder :: (CContent c) => c -> Int
31typeOrder c
32    -- empty
33    | D.isEmpty    c = 1
34
35    -- simple
36    | D.isBool     c = 11
37    | D.isDec      c = 12
38    | D.isClock    c = 13
39    | D.isTime     c = 14
40    | D.isCode     c = 15
41    | D.isTerm     c = 16
42    | D.isText     c = 17
43
44    -- complex
45    | D.isList     c = 21
46    | D.isSet      c = 22
47    | D.isTie      c = 23
48    | D.isRel      c = 24
49    | D.isInterp   c = 25
50    | D.isType     c = 27
51
52    -- end
53    | D.isEnd      c = 31
54    | otherwise      = error "unknown content"
55
